DOC.brief_title: Double Blind Efficacy Safety Study Flexible-Dose v Low-Dose Q8003 After Undergoing Primary Unilateral Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 3 study two-arm , double-blind study : - compare analgesic efficacy safety flexible regimen Q8003 ( 6 mg/4 mg 24 mg/16 mg ) administer every 4-6 hour 48-hour Treatment Period versus low dose Q8003 ( every 4-6 hour 3 mg/2 mg 6 mg/4 mg load dose ) inpatient moderate severe postoperative pain undergone primary unilateral total knee arthroplasty . - evaluate efficacy safety Q8003 administer Voluntary Extension Period start 48 hour initial dose extend Day 12 .
